#include <iostream> 
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;             
int main()                       
{
    long long int test_case; 
    int a,b,c,d=0;
	   for(;;)
	   {
	   	cin>>a>>b>>c;
	   if(a == 0 && b == 0 && c == 0)
	   break;
	   else if(2*b == a+c)
	   {
	   cout<<"AP ";
	   d=c + (b-a);
	   cout<<d<<"\n";
      }
	   else
	   {
	   cout<<"GP ";
	   d = c * (b/a);
	   cout<<d<<"\n";
      }
}
    return 0;                 
}
